column4: It seems that 10.10 is still weak on drivers for old PCs like mine , 10.10 doesn't work with my video card so I can't boot Ubuntu so I'm sticking with 10.04
how interesting... I wish i knew that before I installed 10.10 on her system; which did nothing to show off and convince her to make the switch
by the sounds of it, installed the old one might be the remedy
Just go to Ubuntu website and download the 10.04 and before you install just jump in into live run to see if everything is working fine if it did then install while running using LIVE ;)
